items.name: Apple
items.description: A sweet fruit, rich in fiber and vitamins.
items.selectionTips: Choose firm apples with no bruises.

items.name: Banana
items.description: A soft fruit high in potassium.
items.selectionTips: Choose yellow bananas with few spots.

items.name: Orange
items.description: A juicy citrus fruit, high in vitamin C.
items.selectionTips: Choose firm, brightly colored oranges.

items.name: Grapes
items.description: Small, juicy fruit often used in wines.
items.selectionTips: Choose plump grapes without wrinkling.

items.name: Pineapple
items.description: A tropical fruit with a spiky exterior.
items.selectionTips: Choose a pineapple with a sweet smell.

items.name: Mango
items.description: A sweet tropical fruit rich in vitamins.
items.selectionTips: Choose soft mangoes with a fruity aroma.

items.name: Pear
items.description: A sweet, juicy fruit often used in desserts.
items.selectionTips: Choose pears with firm skin and no blemishes.

items.name: Peach
items.description: A soft fruit with a fuzzy skin and sweet taste.
items.selectionTips: Choose peaches that yield to gentle pressure.

items.name: Kiwi
items.description: A small fruit with a fuzzy skin and green interior.
items.selectionTips: Choose firm, unblemished kiwis.

items.name: Watermelon
items.description: A large, juicy fruit perfect for hydration.
items.selectionTips: Choose watermelons with a deep green color.

items.name: Papaya
items.description: A tropical fruit known for aiding digestion.
items.selectionTips: Choose soft, ripe papayas.

items.name: Cherry
items.description: A small, red fruit with a sweet taste.
items.selectionTips: Choose dark red cherries for best flavor.

items.name: Plum
items.description: A small, juicy fruit with a smooth skin.
items.selectionTips: Choose plums that yield to gentle pressure.

items.name: Lemon
items.description: A sour citrus fruit, rich in vitamin C.
items.selectionTips: Choose firm lemons with bright color.

items.name: Avocado
items.description: A creamy fruit high in healthy fats.
items.selectionTips: Choose avocados that yield to gentle pressure.

items.name: Dragon Fruit
items.description: A vibrant tropical fruit with a mild taste.
items.selectionTips: Choose brightly colored dragon fruit with firm skin.

items.name: Pomegranate
items.description: A juicy fruit with edible seeds.
items.selectionTips: Choose pomegranates with a deep red color.

items.name: Lychee
items.description: A small, tropical fruit with a fragrant flavor.
items.selectionTips: Choose lychees with vibrant, bumpy skin.

items.name: Coconut
items.description: A tropical fruit with edible flesh and water.
items.selectionTips: Choose coconuts that feel heavy for their size.

items.name: Passion Fruit
items.description: A small, round fruit with a tart flavor.
items.selectionTips: Choose wrinkled passion fruits for sweetness.

items.name: Fig
items.description: A sweet fruit with a unique texture.
items.selectionTips: Choose soft figs with smooth skin.

items.name: Guava
items.description: A tropical fruit rich in nutrients.
items.selectionTips: Choose yellow or light green guavas.

items.name: Starfruit
items.description: A fruit with a star-like shape.
items.selectionTips: Choose yellow starfruits without brown spots.

items.name: Jackfruit
items.description: A large fruit with a unique texture.
items.selectionTips: Choose jackfruit with a strong, fruity aroma.

items.name: Durian
items.description: A tropical fruit known for its strong smell.
items.selectionTips: Choose durians with a strong fragrance.

items.name: Quince
items.description: A hard fruit with a tangy taste.
items.selectionTips: Choose yellow, fragrant quinces.

items.name: Rambutan
items.description: A spiky fruit with a sweet flavor.
items.selectionTips: Choose firm rambutans with vibrant color.

items.name: Persimmon
items.description: A soft, sweet fruit often eaten raw.
items.selectionTips: Choose smooth-skinned persimmons.

items.name: Mulberry
items.description: A small berry-like fruit.
items.selectionTips: Choose plump, dark-colored mulberries.

items.name: Tamarind
items.description: A tangy fruit often used in sauces.
items.selectionTips: Choose tamarinds with a slight bend.

items.description: A juicy berry rich in vitamin C.

items.name: Elderberry

items.name: Gooseberry

items.name: Huckleberry

items.name: Chokeberry

items.name: Mulberry

items.name: Juneberry

items.description: A small, sweet berry often found in North America.

items.name: Oregon Grape

items.description: An orange berry packed with vitamin C.

items.description: A red berry with a slightly bitter taste.

items.description: A small, silver-coated berry with a tart flavor.

items.name: Crowberry
items.description: A black berry found in Arctic regions.

items.description: A small, red berry with a mild flavor.

items.description: A soft, delicate berry with a sweet flavor.

items.name: Berry Smoothie
items.instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

items.name: Strawberry Salad
items.instructions: Toss ingredients together and drizzle with balsamic glaze.

items.name: Blueberry Pancakes
items.instructions: Mix ingredients and cook on a griddle until golden.

items.name: Mixed Berry Parfait
items.instructions: Layer yogurt, granola, and berries in a glass.

items.name: Berry Muffins
items.instructions: Mix ingredients and bake at 350°F for 20 mins.

items.name: Raspberry Vinaigrette
items.instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

items.name: Blackberry Cobbler
items.instructions: Layer blackberries and batter, bake at 375°F for 30 mins.

items.name: Cranberry Sauce
items.instructions: Simmer cranberries and sugar in water until thickened.

items.name: Goji Berry Tea
items.instructions: Steep goji berries in hot water for 10 mins.

items.name: Elderberry Syrup
items.instructions: Simmer elderberries and water, then add honey.

items.name: Berry Chia Pudding
items.instructions: Mix chia seeds with milk, refrigerate overnight, top with berries.

items.name: Strawberry Sorbet
items.instructions: Blend ingredients, freeze until firm.

items.name: Raspberry Lemonade
items.instructions: Blend ingredients, strain, and serve chilled.

items.name: Blackberry Salsa
items.instructions: Chop ingredients and mix together.

items.name: Berry Breakfast Bowl
items.instructions: Top yogurt with berries and granola.

items.name: Acai Bowl
items.instructions: Blend acai with banana, top with berries and granola.

items.name: Mulberry Jam
items.instructions: Cook mulberries and sugar, add lemon juice, and jar.

items.name: Cloudberry Ice Cream
items.instructions: Blend ingredients and freeze until firm.

items.name: Lingonberry Sauce
items.instructions: Simmer berries and sugar in water until thick.

items.name: Gooseberry Pie
items.instructions: Fill crust with gooseberries and sugar, bake at 375°F for 45 mins.

items.name: Thimbleberry Jam
items.instructions: Simmer berries with sugar, jar when thickened.

items.name: Huckleberry Syrup
items.instructions: Simmer ingredients until thick, strain if desired.

items.name: Boysenberry Pie
items.instructions: Fill crust with boysenberries and bake at 375°F for 45 mins.

items.name: Berry Crumble
items.instructions: Top berries with oat mixture and bake at 350°F for 30 mins.

items.name: Crowberry Juice
items.instructions: Simmer crowberries in water, strain and sweeten with honey.

items.name: Berry Fruit Leather
items.instructions: Puree berries, spread thinly, and dehydrate.

items.name: Salmonberry Syrup
items.instructions: Simmer berries with sugar and water, strain for syrup.

items.name: Serviceberry Pancakes
items.instructions: Add berries to pancake batter and cook on griddle.

items.name: Maqui Berry Smoothie
items.instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

items.name: Strawberry Basil Jam
items.instructions: Simmer strawberries with basil and sugar until thickened.
